long_description: Stay dry and stylish on your next trip to drizzly Seattle. The men's prAna Stowaway Jacket resists light rain and features a stowaway hood for added protection and a mesh lining for comfort. Brushed nylon slub fabric has a pleasing texture and look. Durable water repellent finish sheds light precipitation. Hood stows away or hides under collar with snaps. Center-back vent enhances airflow. PrAna Stowaway Jacket for men features trapunto-stitched detailing on the welted, zippered hand pockets. Snap cuffs adjust to seal warmth in, weather out.
short_description: Stay dry and stylish on your next trip to drizzly Seattle. The men's prAna Stowaway Jacket resists light rain and features a stowaway hood for added protection and a mesh lining for comfort.
